text:
I think all of that's in master now. The `logdensity` is here:
<https://github.com/cscherrer/MeasureTheory.jl/blob/46c157d3c6f62390f535901ccc008249e979399b/src/combinators/superpose.jl#L43>

We usually work with this, then have the `density` default to just composing that with `exp`. For some cases it might be more natural to go in the other direction
